name: Import of Advanced GHG
text: Increase your heat production 2 steps.
description: Greenhouse gases (GHG) with improved effect

name: Lagrange Observatory
text: Draw 1 card.
description: In a stationary orbit far from the planet, enabling very precise measurements

name: Indentured Workers
text: The next card you play this generation costs 8 mega credits less
description: There are many who would work for us for almost no pay in exchange for a ticket to Mars

name: Power Infrastructure
text: Action: Spend any amount of energy to gain that amount of mega credits.
description: Efficiency through flexibility

name: Plantation
text: Requires 2 science tags. Place a greenery tile and raise oxygen 1 step.
description: By focusing on a limited area, helpful measures can be taken to improve local conditions for plant life

name: Invention Contest
text: LOOK AT THE TOP 3 CARDS FROM THE DECK. TAKE 1 OF THEM INTO HAND AND DISCARD THE OTHER 2
description: Engaging the scientific community in a field of your choice

name: Permafrost Extraction
text: Requires -8C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.
description: Thawing the subsurface

name: Local Heat Trapping
text: Spend 5 heat to either gain 4 plants, or to add 2 animals to ANOTHER card.
description: Life can benefit from local hot spots

name: Energy Saving
text: Increase your energy production 1 step for each city tile in play.
description: Minimizing urban energy spending

name: Flooding
text: Place an ocean tile. IF THERE ARE TILES ADJACENT TO THIS OCEAN TILE, YOU MAY REMOVE 4 MEGA CREDITS FROM THE OWNER OF ONE OF THOSE TILES
description: Look out for tsunamis

name: Windmills
text: Requires 7% oxygen. Increase your energy production 1 step.
description: At last we have more useful winds

name: Aquifer Pumping
text: Action: Spend 8 mega credits to place 1 ocean tile. STEEL MAY BE USED as if you were playing a building card.
description: Underground water reservoirs may be tapped in a controlled manner, to safely build up oceans to the desired level

name: Rad-Suits
text: Requires 2 cities in play. Increase your mega credit production 1 step.
description: New synthetic fabrics, able to protect from cosmic radiation, are becoming high fasion

name: Olympus Conference
text: When you play a science tag, including this, either add a science resource to this card, or remove a science resource from this card to draw a card.
description: The scientific elite, assembled on the top of Olympus Mons, the highest spot in the solar system

name: Livestock
text: Requires 9% oxygen. Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your mega credit production 2 steps.
vp: 1 VP for each animal on this card
description: Providing meat, wool, leather, etc.

name: Biomass Combustors
text: Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.
description: Burning wood is easy

name: Corporate Stronghold
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your mega credit production 3 steps. Place a city tile.
description: A city exclusively devoted to your corporation

name: Ice Cap Melting
text: Requires +2C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.
description: Getting the water back from the poles

name: Fuel Factory
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your titanium and your mega credit production 1 step each.
description: With its shallow gravity well, Mars is a good host for the space industry, and rockets need fuel

name: Soil Factory
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your plant production 1 step
description: There are many harmful elements to remove

name: Heat Trappers
text: Decrease any heat production 2 steps and increase your energy production 1 step.
description: Utilizing temperature gradients for energy production

name: Water Splitting Plant
action: Spend 3 energy to raise oxygen 1 step.
text: Requires 2 ocean tiles
description: Electrolysis of water yields oxygen and hydrogen, both very useful gases

name: Noctis Farming
text: Requires -20C or warmer. Increase your mega credit production 1 step and gain 2 plants
description: Utilizing the uniquely dense and moist atmosphere in the canyons of Noctis Labyrinthus

name: Satellites
text: Increase your mega credit production 1 step for each space tag you have, including this
description: Coordinating orbital traffic

name: Protected Valley
text: Increase your mega credit production 2 steps. Place a greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCAEN, disregarding normal placement restrictions, and increase oxygen 1 step.
description: A fertile valley with higher air density and humidity, but in need of protection when the oceans rise

name: Protected Habitats
text: OPPONENTS MAY NOT REMOVE YOUR plant, animal, or microbes
description: The harsh environment is not the only threat to your ecological projects

name: Pets
text: ANIMALS MAY NOT BE REMOVED FROM THIS CARD. Add 1 animal to this card.
effect: When any city tile is placed, add an animal to this card.
description: It wouldn't be the same without them

name: Magnetic Field Dome
text: Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your plant production 1 step. Raise your terraform rating 1 step.
description: Protecting a limited area from cosmic radiation

name: Aerobraked Ammonia Asteroid
text: Add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card. Increase your heat production 3 steps and your plant production 1 step.
description: Ammonia is a greenhouse gas, as well as being a convenient nitrogen source for organisms

name: Tundra Farming
text: Requires -6C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step and your mega credit production 2 steps. Gain 1 plant.
description: Farming the thawed soil over the frozen bedrock

name: Shuttles
text: Requires 5% oxygen. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your mega credit production 2 steps
effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2 mega credit less for it.
description: Aided by low gravity going up, and by the increasing atmosphere when gliding down for landing

name: Strip Mine
text: Decrease your energy production 2 steps. Increase your steel production 2 steps and your titanium production 1 step. Raise oxygen 2 steps.
description: It is not exactly environmentally friendly to just dig up the surface, but it can be profitable

name: Cartel
text: Increase your mega credit production 1 step for each Earth tag you have, including this.
description: We see it as brotherhood

name: Micro-Mills
text: Increase your heat production 1 step
description: Small, mass-produced windmills that convert some of the ever-present wind into heat

name: Anti-Gravity Technology
effect: When you play a card, you pay 2 mega credit less for it
text: Requires 7 science tags
description: Finally successful, anti-gravity will revolutionize everything, from households to industry and space travel

name: CEO's Favorite Project
text: ADD 1 RESOURCE TO A CARD WITH AT LEAST 1 RESOURCE ON IT
description: Having the top man's attention, the involved people are sure to do their best

name: Insects
text: Requires 6% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for each plant tag you have
description: Pollinating flowers and spreading seeds

name: Herbivores
effect: When you place a greenery tile, add an animal to this card.
text: Requires 8% oxygen. Add 1 animal to this card. Decrease any plant production 1 step.
vp: 1 VP per 2 animals on this card
description: Inhabiting the green hills of Mars

name: Nitrophilic Moss
text: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 2 plants. Increase your plant production 2 steps.
description: Specially made to thrive on the salty Martian rock

name: Tectonic Stress Power
text: Requires 2 science tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps
description: After finding ways to predict earthquakes, it was only a matter of time before it became feasible to exploit the enormous energies involved

name: Titanium Mine
text: Increase your titanium production 1 step
description: Titanium is useful to the space industry because of its great strength

name: Large Convoy
text: Place an ocean tile and draw 2 cards. Gain 5 plants, or add 4 animals to ANOTHER card.
description: Huge delivery from Earth

name: Imported Nitrogen
text: Raise your TR 1 step and gain 4 plants. Add 3 microbes to ANOTHER card and 2 animals to ANOTHER card.
description: Providing nitrogen needed in the atmosphere and for biomass

name: Magnetic Field Generators
text: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps
description: By generating a magnetic field, you can protect organisms from cosmic radiaation

name: Imported GHG
text: Increase your heat production 1 step and gain 3 heat
description: Greenhouse gases (GHG) to retain the heat

name: Convoy From Europa
text: Place 1 ocean tile and draw 1 card
description: Bringing ice and other key supplies from the Jovian moon Europa

name: Power Supply Consortium
text: Requires 2 power tags. Decrease any energy production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.
description: Dominating the energy market allows you to make hostile takeovers

name: Lichen
text: Requires -24C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step.
description: Slow growing, but very resilient

name: Industrial Microbes
text: Increase your energy production and your steel production 1 step each
description: Fuel production and metal refining can be programmed into microorganisms

name: Nitrite Reducing Bacteria
action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 3 microbes to increase your TR 1 step.
text: Add 3 microbes to this card
description: Making use of the nitrites in the ground to release nitrogen into the atmosphere

name: Standard Technology
effect: After you pay for a standard project, except selling patents, you gain 3 mega credits
description: Standard solutions honed to perfection

name: Designed Micro-organisms
text: It must be -14C or colder. Increase your plant production 2 steps
description: Specializing in extremely cold conditions

name: Caretaker Contract
action: Spend 8 heat to increase your terraforming rating 1 step
text: Requires 0C or warmer
description: In charge of establishing comfortable temperatures

name: Adaptation Technology
effect: Your global requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case
description: Pushing the limits of the possible

name: Insulation
text: Decrease your heat production any number of steps and increase your mega credit production the same number of steps
description: Better insulation means lower energy spending

name: Investment Loan
text: Decrease your mega credit production 1 step. Gain 10 mega credit
description: Taking a loan to fund that urgent project

name: Mohole Area
text: Increase your heat production 4 steps. Place this tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FFOR OCEAN
description: Tunnels deep down to the molton magma, releasing heat and gases

name: Power Plant
text: Increase your energy production 1 step
description: Standard equipment, normal output

name: Lava Flows
text: Raise temperature 2 steps and place this tile ON EITHER THARSIS THOLUS, ASCRAEUS MONS, PAVONIS MONS OR ARSIA MONS
description: Releasing tremendous lava flows from one of Mars' gargantuan volcanoes

name: Wave Power
text: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 1 step.
description: Well, see, first you need some waves...

name: Great Dam
text: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps.
description: Letting natural processes do the work

name: Advanced Ecosystems
text: Requires a plant tag, a microbe tag, and an animal tag.
description: Constructing functional, dynamic ecosystems requires many ingredients

name: Extreme-Cold Fungus
action: Gain 1 plant or add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.
text: It must be -10C or colder
description: Adapted strains able to form symbiotic relationships with other organisms

name: Symbiotic Fungus
action: Add a microbe to ANOTHER card.
text: Requires -14C or warmer.
description: Creating mutually beneficial conditions

name: Fusion Power
text: Requires 2 power tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.
description: State of the art technology

name: Decomposers
effect: When you play an animal, plant, or microbe tag, including this, add a microbe to this card.
text: Requires 3% oxygen.
vp: 1 VP per 3 microbes on this card
description: Decomposing dead organisms is essential to making sustainable soil

name: Worms
text: Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for every 2 microbe tags you have, including this.
description: Milling about in the soil, 'processing' it

name: Zeppelins
text: Requires 5% oxygen. Increase your mega credit production 1 step for each city tile ON MARS.
description: A relatively cheap way to travel between cities across the planet

name: Ecological Zone
effect: When you play an animal or a plant tag (including these 2), add an animal to this card.
text: Requires that you have a greenery tile. Place this tile ADJACENT TO ANY GREENERY TILE.
vp: 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.
description: A secluded area where a multitude of species develop an ecosystem

name: Subterranean Reservoir
text: Place 1 ocean tile.
description: Also known as an aquifer. Burst one open and you've got a lot of water

name: GHG Factories
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 4 steps.
description: Synthesizing powerful greenhouse gases (GHGs), releasing them into the atmosphere

name: Hackers
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and any mega credit production 2 steps. Increase your mega credit production 2 steps.
description: Very unethical, very illegal, very lucrative

name: Hired Raiders
text: Steal up to 2 steel, or 3 mega credit from any player
description: We have a better use for those resources

name: Industrial Center
action: Spend 7 mega credit to increase your steel production 1 step.
text: Place this tile ADJACENT TO A CITY TILE
description: Assigned to heavy industry, this area is not the nicest place on Mars

name: Moss
text: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 1 plant. Increase your plant production 1 step.
description: Efficient soil makers

name: Sabotage
text: Remove up to 3 titanium from any player, or 4 steel, or 7 mega credit
description: Nobody will know who did it.

name: Urbanized Area
text: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your mega credit production 2 steps. Place a city tile ADJACENT TO AT LEAST 2 OTHER CITY TILES
description: When the population begins to soar, cities will eventually merge into large urban areas

name: Dust Seals
text: Requires 3 or less ocean tiles
description: Tight seals to keep micron-sized dust out of buildings, vehicles and suits

name: Farming
text: Requires +4C or warmer. Increase your mega credit production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants
description: At last we can have a decent food production allowing for rapid population increase

name: Great Escarpment Consortium
text: Requires that you have steel production. Decrease any steel production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.
description: The border between the northern plains and the southern highlands is rich in minerals. Control it, and you will control the global mining business
